Sept. 27, 1913 D Crystal Palace (Boys Section)
Crystal Palace (Boys Section) 200 Test Piece Contest National Championship of Great Britain (Finals) crystal-palace-boys-section
Beulah
Crystal Palace (School of Art), Crystal Palace Park, Sydenham, County of London, England, UK Prizes: 1st Woods Challenge cup,metronome value £1.1s. and £5 cash, 2nd £2, 3rd £1.
9 bands competed.
Info from British Bandsman 11/10/1913.
Jan. 20, 2013, 5:32 p.m. July 11, 2014, 12:28 p.m.
